name: Broadmaw

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Arena by 33%

skills.name: Ice Blast
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%

skills.name: Gift
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 15% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Resurrect
skills.raw_description:
Revives 2 random dead allies with 25% HP. Places a [Block Damage] buff on the revived allies for 1 turn.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +10%
Lvl. 4 Heal +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Lizardmen is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: The Lizardmen evolved from the brackish waters of Teleria longbefore modern humanoid races emerged with more powerfulbrains. These fearsome amphibious bipeds have been deemeduntouchable but are tolerated in swamps and city sewers. Theytrade through messengers to get sustenance, or ransom for theircaptives.

seo.description: Broadmaw is a epic assist champion from the faction Lizardmen doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
